content: pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only stay cozy and trendy in our braided fishtail toque front post and back post stitches are used to create a beautiful cable resembling a fishtail braid hat is worked from the bottom up and comes in baby to adult size this design is unisex and includes a video tutorial for child size on youtube designed in knit picks/ wecrochet alpaca cloud dk this is an intermediate design pdf pattern includes 5 sizes 3-6mth 6-12mth toddler child adult yarn requirements knit picks alpaca cloud dk 100% baby alpaca 123yds/50g shown in evander 6-12mth magnus child leonardo adult # balls 2 2 3 3 3 yards 185 215 260 300 330 buy yarn here http //shrsl com/24r64 crochet hook requirements us g/6 4mm or size needed to obtain gauge additional supplies yarn needle faux fur pom pom garment tag optional gauge 9 sts and 11 row equal to 2 in single_crochet blo 12 sts and 7 row equal to 2 in cable stitch video tutorial https //youtu be/lwalaiceg3q you are welcome to sell finished product from this design please reference sentry box designs as designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
